title: Ep. 97 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Dr. Drew & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Start building better habits for healthier, long-term results. Sign up for your trial at https://Noom.com/BEARS. - Get an extra $50 off sitewide, on top of their Biggest Sale of the Year when you go to https://Kamikoto.com/CAVE and use the offer code CAVE - Go to https://Squarespace.com for a free trial and when you’re ready to launch, use the offer code BEARS to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain - Get 15% off your order at https://BuyRaycon.com/bears - Go to https://HelloTushy.com/BEARS to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping. - Go to https://MillerLite.com/CAVE to find delivery options near you. It's Miller Time. - Head to https://PolicyGenius.com/2BEARS1CAVE to get started right now. Policygenius. When it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right.

Tom Segura is out for this week's episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, but Dr. Drew Pinsky joins Bert Kreischer in his place. They discuss Joe Rogan's recent announcement, and Drew gives his input on the medicine Joe decided to take. They also discuss Bert's love of drinking, why they don't cheat on their wives, Bert's feelings about selling out an arena, Armie Hammer and Trevor Bauer's recent controversies, and Bert gives an update on his surgery and recovery. They also talk about China, psilocybin mushrooms, and Bert's uncle who encouraged him to do stand-up.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
